components.name: qDrWQi

pages.title: Key performance indicators (KPIs) for Pillar 1 - Foundations

components.name: vkaUmE
components.content:
Tell us your proposed annual target for the following KPIs. 
See the prospectus for help to answer this section.

components.name: ISGTYP
components.content: Workforce data

components.name: MIJxyP
components.title: Annual qualitative and quantitative data set (Target: 1)

components.name: KrFgOw
components.title: Response rate to annual workforce survey (Target: 50%)

components.name: rDeBgw
components.content: National homelessness skills framework

components.name: oTqyGh
components.title: Consultation focus groups to develop content and design (Target: 4)

components.name: QwWnCs
components.content: Qualification development

components.name: cKlQBj
components.title: Number of new accredited courses developed

components.name: fkroxO
components.title: Number of students enrolled on new accredited courses

components.name: yFZwrf
components.title: Learner feedback quality rating of excellent or good for level 3, 4 and 7 courses (Target: 95%)

pages.title: Key performance indicators (KPIs) for Pillar 2 - Training

components.name: bdfAqC
components.content:
Tell us your proposed annual target for the following KPIs. 
See the prospectus for help to answer this section.

components.name: CQOoUK
components.content: National funded training and qualification package (essential learning)

components.name: izCLJA
components.content: Training sessions

components.name: DETxHE
components.title: Total number of online and pre-recorded training sessions (Target: 930)

components.name: mUJFZg
components.content: Online training content

components.name: AwAfqQ
components.content: Learning pathways

components.name: hJNYGH
components.content: Learner feedback

components.name: MaDxNQ
components.title: Learner feedback on training: Quality rating of excellent, very good or good (Target: 95%)

components.name: sOaQTu
components.title: Learner feedback on training: Able to apply the knowledge gained in their role (Target: 75%)

components.name: tMOGRK
components.content: Sector practice support

components.name: YVthsj
components.content: Resources, publications and good practice support

components.name: ZhDzri
components.title: Information sessions, for example meetings, conferences and visits. Include both internal and with other National Workforce Programme grantees. (Target: 20)

components.name: PXckho
components.content: Convening the sector

components.name: BjussF
components.title: Total number of groups convened to develop resources and co-design training, content and sector insight reports (Target: 32)

pages.title: Key performance indicators (KPIs) for Pillar 3 - Advice

components.name: RUsjKo
components.content:
Tell us your proposed annual target for the following KPIs. 
See the prospectus for help to answer this section.

components.name: AVcfQM
components.content: Specialist housing and homelessness advice service

components.name: ISgoxZ
components.content: Enquiries to the specialist housing and homelessness advice service

components.name: kLOGdG
components.title: Total number of enquires by webchat or telephone (Target: 13,400)

components.name: ZFauqY
components.title: Total number of repeat enquiries by webchat or telephone (Target: 750)

components.name: rhPzpj
components.title: Total number of digital sessions based on 30 minutes window of users navigating digital content (Target: 1,000,000)

components.name: PpXmxG
components.title: % of all enquiries answered within specific timescale (Target: 95%)

components.name: npIufc
components.content: User feedback surveys

components.name: WJvhcD
components.title: User feedback: Feel more confident in advising on the topic in the future (Target: 80%)

components.name: VMrKqL
components.title: End outcome: Advice led to improved or successful outcome for example, a delayed eviction or resolution of homeless application query (Target: 60%)
